author: dperlman
title: IO to the World: Cardano Unchained
description: The full power of Cardano will be unleashed when it can comprehensively understand—and be understood by—assets and events in the real world.
importance: Numerous proposals in this area have appeared in the past. Many have been voted highly but failed from lack of funds.
success: Cardano gets more oracles, more IOT, and more assets tokenized on-chain: real estate, commodities, music, forests, carbon credits, patents…
